posts.postText:
Sort of bored, decided to make this.

So guys/gals, what sports you play?

Last year I played jv soccer, jv hockey, and jv track, this year I'm doing varsity track (sprinting).

I think I'm starting to get lazy so I chose track because all you really do is run in circles.

Play now:Basketball and Soccer.
Used to: Baseball and Football
I hate soccer, I use to play it because I could run fast, then I just switched to track
I can run pretty fast, but I'm better at long distance. I've been in gymnastics and fencing but it got in the way of my gaming.

I'm small and fast which makes me good for soccer.
I am probably the best shooter and stealer on my team for basketball.
I used to play golf.
I used to play soccer.
Volleyball
Used to play basketball and hockey.
karate, would have made the us team for worlds, but im at college getting an edumacation
I'm a beast at soccer.
I use to do girl's football.

Is computing a sport? 
Just kidding, i hate sports but i do like running though. And i used to admire snowboarding.
Playing soccer for around 11 years now.
Moar soccer for me.
I race motocross ;P
I play wrestling, basketball and teh golfz
Varsity Track, Varsity Cross Country, And used to Soccer.
Paintball, soccer, tad bit of baseball, and atv racing (used to)

Dunno if you may count some of these but here we go.

Tennis, Basketball, Baseball (pitcher), Boxing, Taekwondo. These are the major ones I like doing.

Football, Soccer. Ones I do with friends few times a month.

Other then that, I have spent the last few months trying to learn how to Parkour correctly. (yes, you can completely parkour wrong)
I don't do anything, i sit on my fat ass and play TTT while it's empty so i can win every single round ;~;

I wrestle. Wrestled varsity freshman year and this year (sophomore year) i wanna wrestle varsity again
